title: Trade, Venezuela & GM Tweets
itunes:title: Trade, Venezuela & GM Tweets
description:
Kevin spoke with David Green, President of UAW Local 1112, to discuss Trump's latest tweets on GM. Kevin also spoke with Matt Mowers, former senior White House advisor for the state department, and Jennifer Holdsworth, Democratic Strategist and MWWPR Senior Vice President of Issues Management, to discuss trade talks, Devin Nunes on suing Twitter, and President Trump meeting with the President of Brazil, Jair Bolsonaro.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
